thread.title: Mets reliever Hansel Robles suspended for throwing at Phillies' batter - Sports
thread.title_full: Mets reliever Hansel Robles suspended for throwing at Phillies' batter - Sports - NorthJersey.com

author: MATT EHALT
title: Mets reliever Hansel Robles suspended for throwing at Phillies' batter - Sports
text:
PHILADELPHIA - Mets reliever Hansel Robles has been suspended three games for "intentionally throwing" at the Phillies' Cameron Rupp in Wednesday's game, Major League Baseball announced.
Buy this photo AP FILE PHOTO Mets relief pitcher Hansel Robles. (AP File Photo/Kathy Willens) Robles, who also received an undisclosed fine, was ejected Wednesday night after a fastball he threw went up and in near Rupp's head.
There are three games left in the regular season.
Prior to Robles' pitch, two Mets were hit by pitches and one Phillies batter was hit. Both benches had been warned when Robles threw near Rupp in the sixth inning.
